gt_summary: Measure out four tablespoons calcium (carbonate) powder. Add two tablespoons baking soda. Include ½ teaspoon of stevia. Sprinkle in one teaspoon sea salt. Mix all of the ingredients together.
pred_summary: Unterscheidung between Calcium Carbonate and Calcium Citrate. Calcium carbonate is a common ingredient in toothpaste and is used to help strengthen tooth enamel. Calcium citrate, on the other hand, is a more recent ingredient that has been shown to be more effective at preventing tooth decay than calcium carbonate. It is important to note that calcium carbonate is not the same as calcium citrate, and the two should not be used interchangeably in toothpaste recipes.
